attributes.action: Where are energy companies in this crucial 'we're all in this together time'?
attributes.additional_details: Everyone from the glorious NHS, to local communities pulling together to help the vulnerable and each other. Politicians from all parties are unprecedented in speaking with one voice in the knowledge that we are living in destructing times. While people are losing jobs, households are forced to stay at home, the energy companies are rubbing their hands in disbelief as household energy bills soar.
attributes.background: Everyone, the NHS, to local communities pulling together to help the vulnerable and each other. While people are losing jobs, households are forced to stay at home, the energy companies are rubbing their hands in disbelief as household energy bills soar.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 
                
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You may wish to sign this petition:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302256
